title: Change of registered agent by entity
context: [ยง425R-7] Change of registered agent by entity. (a) A represented entity may change the information currently on file under section 425R-4(a) by filing with the director a certified statement of change signed on behalf of the entity that states the: (1) Name of the entity; and (2) Information that is to be in effect as a result of the filing of the statement of change. (b) Interest holders or governors of a domestic entity need not approve the filing of a: (1) Statement of change under this section; or (2) Similar filing changing the registered agent or registered office of the entity in any other jurisdiction. &copy; The appointment of a registered agent pursuant to subsection (a) is an affirmation by the represented entity that the agent has consented to serve as such. (d) A statement of change filed under this section takes effect on filing. [L 2009, c 55, pt of ยง1]
